name: Horror Math
description:
* Is it possible to get rid of some kind of "creature" with your mathematical knowledge?

* All you have to do is use your mind to escape from the house of fear!

* Both "Math Fear" and destroy this "Freak" creature!

* Hurry up! Do not forget to solve the questions as you move away from the creature quickly!

* "Blades" in the rooms are the only thing to get the creatures out of the way!

* You must trust your Chance in this game!

* It will not be easy to guess the right door in your chance games!


* Come on, Show Yourself !!!
